Story: 1. As a project manager I want initial project setup and planning completed so development can begin efficiently
Comment:
First commit with time estimates and repository setup README creation.
Includes quick data exploration, architecture design and model and framework selection

Story: 2. As a user I want to access my order information so I can track my purchases
Comment: Setting up order data retrieval API, making sure it functions properly
Setting up the chatbot with order query functionality, running 5 test questions.

Story: 3. As a user I want to query product information so I can find items I'm interested in
Comment: Cleaning indexing and optimizing for search

Story: 4. As a developer I want to host the chatbot on a cloud-based interface for interactive testing
Comment: Host the backend server as REST API endpoints

Story: 5. As a user I want a simple interface to interact with the chatbot
6. As a developer I want to compare different models for optimal performance
Comment: Testing different LLMs for accuracy, cost and latency
